sentences.en: " Very good, " interrupted the director, nodding his head significantly.
sentences.cn: “ 很好, ” 导演打断了她, 意味深长地点着头.

sentences.en: A glass or two of wine will not significantly add to the calorie count.
sentences.cn: 喝一两杯葡萄酒不会增加多少热量。

sentences.en: Growth in the Gross Domestic Product ( GDP ) decelerated significantly, from 10.5 per cent in real terms in 2000 to a mere 0.1 per cent in 2001.
sentences.cn: 本地 生产总值 的实质增长由2000年10.5%大幅减至2001年仅有0.1%.

sentences.en: If I wanted to improve the car significantly I would have to pull it apart and start again.
sentences.cn: 如果想好好地改进这辆车，我将不得不把它拆开重装。

sentences.en: It is significantly more compact than any comparable laptop, with no loss in functionality.
sentences.cn: 它比同类笔记本电脑小巧很多，但功能未减。

sentences.en: It was noted that within a year the incidence of illness had increased quite significantly.
sentences.cn: 据观察一年之内发病率显著上升。

sentences.en: Most people have speech, but significantly fewer have writing.
sentences.cn: 大多数人都能说, 但能写的人就少多了.

sentences.en: On its way, it expanded significantly in function, role, and visual aspect.
sentences.cn: 在这个过程中, 按钮显著地扩展了它的功能 、 作用和视觉特征.

sentences.en: She looked up at me significantly, raising an eyebrow.
sentences.cn: 她抬起头，眉毛扬起，意味深长地看着我。

sentences.en: Significantly, the company recently opened a huge store in Atlanta.
sentences.cn: 值得注意的是，该公司最近在亚特兰大开了一家大型商店。

sentences.en: Tests have shown that these new tyres are significantly safer.
sentences.cn: 试验表明这些新的轮胎要安全得多.

sentences.en: The Democrats, significantly, finished well behind the Green Party.
sentences.cn: 值得注意的是，民主党的得票数远远落后于绿党。

sentences.en: The dotted lines indicate which AO's contribute significantly to each MO.
sentences.cn: 虚线表示出哪些AO对各MO有重要贡献.

sentences.en: The French entente with Great Britain had already been significantly extended.
sentences.cn: 法国和英国之间友好协议的范围已经大幅度拓宽。

sentences.en: The topography of the river's basin has changed significantly since the floods.
sentences.cn: 该河流域的地形自洪水以来发生了显著变化。

sentences.en: We have significantly increased the number of people in education but the size of the classes hasn't changed proportionately.
sentences.cn: 受教育的人数显著增加了，可是班级人数并未相应增加。

words.tran_cn: 重大的；有效的；有意义的；值得注意的；意味深长的
有意义的；表示…的；为…提供推定证据的
有重要性；要紧；冒充内行
意味深长地；值得注目地

trans.tran_cn: 有重大意义地，显著地，意味深长地
trans.tran_en: used to say that something is very important
